content.detailedDescription: Friend and i outside playing. i was about ten yrs old.The object just shot down instantly and hovered above tree top at sidewalk. my friend was screaming he wanted to go home.I was calm and could see shadow people through white windows that went all around ufo. i observed it had symbols on the bottom of the ufo that now i call hieroglyphics and ufo was metal but not shiny. i noticed two jet planes flying way above and back in forth like they watching also. then a blue beam came out of bottom and scanned the neighborhood like it looking for something.I noticed neighbor lady standing outside, which odd for her. then it took off super fast and away toward right from jets. my friend made me walk him home. the next day i heard my mom say the police or army,not sure who she meant called it mass hysteria. i thought, but the old lady who never came outside across the road saw it too. i don't think it was my first encounter either. i knew that from then on we not alone like church people say.I don't know why me but it felt like it was there cause of me and i wasn't scared. i just looked at them and they looked at me. none believes me but i tell everyone cause i know truth. i think they picked me for some reason. i know people think i watched it on tv or imagined it in a dream but it happened. it was summer and 1977 or 1978. i have tried to connect yrs and month s of other sightings but the year not exact nor the month cause i was so young. but i had been to air shows and knew what jets, planes,helicopter's look like. my dad was national guard then too. thanks for listening.
content.summary: Playing outside, ufo approached, hovered, low humming, symbols on bottom, two jet planes observing, blue beam looking for something,

content.detailedDescription: I've had 6 different experiences 3 much more intance experience than listed above. a total of 6 experiences totally. to much information than i can list here. credibility i'm a retired firefighter. two of the experiences i reported to the sheriff's dept.
content.summary: Saw ufo while driving, got a neighbor he saw it , also county sheriff stop with us he saw it then chased after it

content.detailedDescription: I was having dinner with a date at the fort on hwy 285 west of morrison co.I was talking to the owner ,sam when he first looked out of the window and spotted a vary bright light over denver about 30 miles away , my date and i , with others in the restaurant watched for about 10 min's . at first we though it was an airplane,then it seemed to move at a high rate of speed south towards littleton so. of denver, stopped suddenly then reversed coarse back to the north, which seemed to be over northgleen co. all in a space of time about in 5 seconds. it hovered about 15to20 second's staying at the same altitude aprox. 3to4 thousand feet above the city.Then suddenly climbed at a 45 deg. angle straight south back toward's littlton, it hovered for a few seconds , then sipped back over denver . it sat there for about 8 or so min's i don't remember seeing any other aircraft in the area. after those few min's hovering, it went straight up and vanished out of sight. all of us in the restaurant didn't talk about at all. the next day sam and i talked about it ,and just wondered.I'v have been a pilot commercial for 35 years and have seen simmelar events in night flights in wa. state i did'nt talk about it, because i would have had my medical license revoked. finally got it off my chest after 50 years .Thanks to your hanger 1 files.!!
content.summary: Bright fast moveing light aprox. 3000ft above denver moveing at vary high rate of speed changeing directions abruptly several times

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on deck, overcast skies, west side of house. dark out, past sunset. noticed object in sky moving extremely rapidly from south to north. bright color, flame orange, round/oval in shape, heading almost due north. absolutely no sound. under the cloud cover.  appeared larger than a jet plane. no blinking lights of any kind. moved out of sight to the north. not a plane, helicopter, satellite or shooting star - nothing like anything we've ever seen before.
content.summary: Unrecognizable flying object unlike any seen before

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend were leaving his apartment he lived with his mother and we walked to the store which was next door to the apartment complex and when we got to the store we noticed a round object over agnes barden elementary school just hovering around  500 feet  above school may have been more or maybe a little less we just looked at it for awhile and it looked like somebody looking out were the round light portals were, i mean this object was humongous; bigger than a c5 galaxy plane. it happen around  1980,  i was still in high school at the time,  we looked at it for a long time everybody that pulled into the store we got them to look at it and they looked and were astonished and scared,
   back then in the bloomfield area of macon when it got dark most people were at home. it was the biggest thing i ever saw in the sky. i noticed that the lights  were in no certain pattern around the round sphere that i remember.   it happened 35 years ago. i remember the next day we talked about and nobody could believe what they had seen, i remember the night it happen while i was walking home i keep looking behind me and i remember seeing the round sphere with lights on it and the round sphere was dark in color and it appeared something was walking around in  the light portals. i also remember checking the newspaper the next day and nothing was in  the paper, i mean we looked at the thing for a couple hours somebody with some authority had to have seen it. warner robins air force base is about 10-15 miles from were we were at.
   i just thought that;  that i would report what i had seen and remember i was watching the hanger one show and decided to report this incident, i didn't know who to tell to, until  i seen the show. i hope this helps out, if i had known who to report this to 35 years ago i would have. contact me by phone if you want to and i can draw you a diagram of what i seen if you need any idea of what was seen that night, i can not remember the date, i just know it happened, i will include a crude drawing of what i seen that night. 
     the month that i am submitting when the event happened  is probaly wrong, i just cannot remember what month it happen it was 35 years ago.           the time inclded maybe a hour or so off
         i includeed a diagram of what was seen that night
content.summary: Round with lights around  on body

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was on interstate 90 driving in wisconsin as i was on my way to minnesota to pick up my son. i like to drive on the 4 hour and 30min drive late into the night so i get there early morning. 

2) i was smoking a cig and listing to my xm radio and just looked up driving as i notice 2 bright white disc looking lights about 5 or more miles away. i was the only car on the highway at this point and even if the ufo was far away i could see it from a distance. 

3) when i first noticed the object i told myself oh my i'm looking at a ufo. as i do believe but never would think i would ever see one. i was in shock trying to reach for my cell phone to take video but i was having like a panic attack over the incident i didn't record it in time. 

4) when i seen it was circle looking bright white in one place then few seconds later i seen two. they were just hovering in one place from a distance as i was about 5 to 8 miles from it on the highway as they were towards the wooded area away from the highway. then about 15 to 20 seconds later they both zig zag in very weird direction that's not possible for something man made. then after a few moments later they were gone so fast it was like they disappeared. 

5) my feelings and reactions were shocking. i felt shaken up a bit and could of had a panic attack. i'm in my early 30's and a grown man and still knew my dad would be up and not sleeping. so i texted him what happen after the ufo went away and he didn't believe me. so after that i never really told anyone about it. i started to watch more history channel and the shows called ancient aliens and hangar 1 to learn more about the sightings. 

6) how did i lose sight of the object it disappeared like it must of moved super fast straight up.
content.summary: On interstate 90 about 45 miles before la crosse see circle white lights two that zig zag then stand still but fly away.

content.detailedDescription: It was nearly late afternoon , clear sky ,early fall but still warm , i think it was,oct/nov.My friend and i was sitting out in  lawn recliners waiting on his sis to bring us iced teas , and it suddenly appeared over the desert hill ne like it came fromthe town mojave about 12 mls. from us it made no noise at all it was ginormous!  like a planet fell from the sky , by then all three of us were seeing it , and still no noise it hovered over us for a good five minutes then shot straight up and was gone in a count of three. my friends said afterwards that they've seen a cigar shaped one in the area yrs ago but not one like this.This was in the back yard you could say by the edwards airforce base and the dry lake bed , don't know if anyone else saw it then, but i would like to know. i dont know the county of lancaster, ca. so i just picked one sorry.
content.summary: Me and two others were in the back yard , it came over the back of a hill in antelope valley

content.detailedDescription:
My date said we should go on this adventure, so he gave me directions on how to get to this "really neat sight".  i drove north east off of the old lancaster hwy. got off onto osborne street that turned into little tujunga canyon road and drove exactly 7 miles upward.  the drive was through a desolate road with what looked like dead trees. the road went upward on a dirt road up a small mountain.  at the top was what looked like a movie prop the size of a house.  it was metallic with red/green flashing lights on the outside.  we parked the car and my date told me to go with him to this object. he somehow managed to climb to the top and open a hatch.  he got me to take a look inside where there was a panel with many gold lights, etc. this is when i became scared and got off the object and went back to the car. i asked him to come with me, but he wanted to go into this hatch.  i waited what seemed a long time til he came out and we drove off.  up to the point when i looked inside i basically thought it was a movie prop, but when i climbed on it, it felt solid and looked real inside.

i never saw my date after that, but i did want to show someone else, and at the same time validate what i saw, so i asked my best friend to take the drive with me again three months later.  so on 6/19/71, we drove up to the same place.  the object was gone, but there was what looked like burn marks outlining where the object had been.
content.summary: I saw and touched what looked like a landed ufo back in 1971

content.detailedDescription:
I can't remember if it was 1973 or 1974, but it was hot out. at the time, people didn't have whole house air conditioning, so i moved my bed in front of my bedroom window to sleep in the summer for the slight breeze. i was only 13 at the time i think.

i woke up in the middle of the night to use the bathroom, but when i woke up i was distracted by lights in the sky above and well beyond the tree outside. i watched the lights for about 10 minutes before i finally got up to get a drink of water and use the bathroom. when i came back the lights dispersed in different directions very quickly, faster than anything possible both now and then.

during the 10 minutes or so that i watched the lights, there were multiple numbers of lights that came and went in very quick time but in no real formation. they acted independently.

i was told by my parents the next morning that i was dreaming, but believe me i wasn't. i never even mentioned this event again until i told my husband of 15 years just recently. 

when i first saw the lights, i thought that it may have been some military test, but i have never seen anything ever since to indicate that rca/ge or nasa is doing anything like what i saw over 30 years ago.

my feelings at the time were 1st)confusion 2nd)fascination 3rd)concern 4rth)should i hide 5th)where are they going?

after the points of lights left, spot light from the ground from the city were sweeping the airspace. they were spotlights that used to be on naval bases or air bases.
content.summary: I was a teen at the time and couldn't come forward even though my father worked for rca/ge. i was told that i was dreaming. i wasn't

content.detailedDescription: it was three of us. we were in our front yard at our picknick table.Under our big oak tree. my brother ricky our friend vicky blackstock and my self. it was a normal summer day.Out of no where,it got dark. we all looked up.And it was a huge craft. it coverd the sky above us. it was big as three football fields. it came right over the top of us it slowly passed over top of us. it shadowed every thing. and then that was all there was to it.It just slowly passed over the top of us and it was gone.No sound no lights,nothing,just this humongus craft, and the solid shadow over head.That caused us three to look up at the same time. it was so frigen real and just there.! it had to of covered our  intire nieboohood. im sure that other people had to seen it. because it was in broad day light!! my brother asked me if i remembered this happening to us just before he died.In jan. 2010 and that is the truth!! id love to talk more about it. and find out who eles saw this thing? big as a mountain?  can you help me to find out? thanx, pamela slate   vicky lives in gulf shores ala.  this was in 1973. i was 13 year old. now im 55 year old. thanx again, hope something can come out of this! thanx ps   i wanted to go in and get th camera. but i didn't, because i new that i would miss something..
content.summary: One huge craft. blocked the sky.  came over the top of us, broad day-lite

content.detailedDescription:
We were in flight in a c-130 (military) aircraft at approximately 30 thousand feet, and at least 500 miles south of louisiana over the gulf of mexico. we were on a navigator training mission in clear skies on a very sunny day. we were outside of us radar control range so no immediate reporting method was available. i was in the co-pilot's seat, and i was the first to notice the object which appeared to hover at a constant distance just above and in front of us. it didn't appear to be any threat, and just looked like a big silver pinball floating in front of us.

at first, i thought it might be possible that we had sighted a weather balloon and i mentioned this to the rest of the crew. but as we continued southbound at approximately 300 knots, and this object maintained perfect position in front of us, it became obvious that this was no weather balloon. other crew members also mentioned that a weather balloon is usually of an elongated shape, and this object appeared perfectly round. there were no visible windows or appendages on this object, but it appeared to be under intelligent control (maintaining perfect speed and altitude to match ours). 

our entire crew came forward next to my seat (one by one) and took turns viewing this object through the front windscreen. none of our crew members had a camera with them on this day, and we did have a long discussion about the lack of proof should we decide to report this sighting. since we were on a navigator training mission, we were obligated to maintain a steady course (approximately southbound) and did so until we reached the planned turn around point.

we continued on course for approximately one hour, checking the position of the object every few seconds. it never changed position, relative to our aircraft, for at least an hour. since this object didn't appear threatening in any way, we eventually stopped even discussing it.

the object disappeared somehow between my frequent checking of it's position, and i didn't see it depart our flight path. it was there one second, and gone the next. my crosscheck for airborne traffic as a copilot had always been very thorough, so i remember being surprised by the fact that the object was gone without my seeing it leave. the rest of the crew (except the pilot) seemed to forget all about the object after fifteen or twenty minutes. we discussed this sighting on the trip back, and decided not to report it at that time.
content.summary: Flying in c-130 aircraft over gulf of mexico. were tracked and led at altitude by ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister and i were talking to our neighbor around dusk when a ufo appeared behind our neighbor.  it was only about 100 ft off the ground and about 250 feet away.  my sister and i saw it at the same time.  it flew in from above coming toward us and then stopped mid-flight and hovered for 15-20 seconds.  it then with instantaneous acceleration darted off in a fairly straight level flight path to our left out of sight.  it was very low so we lost sight quickly after it accelerated. 

the speed when it flew off was very fast and seemingly instantaneous acceleration.  there was no sound, no jet or propeller noise, or exhaust from the ufo.  somewhat erie how it could move in stop, hoover and accelerate without any sound of any kind -- it just seemed to be able to jump to an incredible speed after it stopped.  

what is also interesting is the ufo appeared about a mile nw of lambert international airport in the landing path of the landing planes.  however, it moved diagonal to the flight path and much lower than the incoming planes.  we had lived there for about12 years and were very accustomed to planes coming into land but never saw a plane of any kind where this appeared as it was very low and not even traveling in the direction toward the runways to land.  the landing planes were also directly right above our house most to the time. the ufo was also much lower than any plane and the acceleration was incredible from a completely stationary position. 

my sister and i could not believe what we saw and were mesmerized by the craft.  our neighbor was very startled by how we reacted as we no longer were paying attention to our conversation and staring behind and above her.  however, before our neighbor could turn around to look, the ufo flew off and she did not see it.  after it darted off, my sister and i looked at each other in disbelief.  i have never seen anything like this since nor have i ever seen any aircraft with the flight characteristics of this craft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Classic saucer shape ufo disc - metallic color with a small dome on top

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
     big sky, montana 45.26n 111.36w.  hanging out at an outdoor jacuzzi with clear skies.  the skies were so clear that a portion of the milky way could be seen.   we were facing east and the objects were flying about 85 to 90 degrees above.  six bright blue/white lights at high altitudes were observed.

2. what made you first notice the object?
     another person looked up and asked me what were we looking at.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
     the objects were flying too high to be airplanes.  objects flew from north to south north, south to north, and south to west.  the last 2 objects were flying in opposite directions going north and south to a point that one of the none believers thought they were going to crash into each other at high altitudes, but it did not happen.  we compared 1 airplane north of us flying north east and another airplane south of us going west/southwest.  some people that were witnesses that do not believe in ufo's commented the objects were too high to be airplanes and did not know what the objects were.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
      objects flew in a mostly straight line, but would make very small zig zag motions and disappeared with distance.  they flew at high speeds and too high to be airplanes.  they were bright blue/white and almost the same color of the stars.
      
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
      amazed what i was witnessing and wishing my cameras worked better under these circumstances.  if it was not a ufo, then my only guess would be they were satellites or extreme high altitude military craft activities.  we did not think they were commercial air crafts.  we witnessed more activity of similar behavior the next day.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
       objects kept flying until they disappear with distance.
content.summary: Observed 6 individual bright light flying at higher than normal altitudes.

content.detailedDescription: Friend and i were sitting by campfire after day of bear hunting off old logging roads. we both noticed a large orange orb traveling across the sky. we both drew attention since it was so close and made no sound. it didn't change direction, went across out view. we camped ay high elevation and had a larger view of the mountain range. at first we were curious and watched, then questioned and silent once we confirmed out sight. it was in our sight for a minute and past. after we both talked about what it may have been and ruled out possibility of any known aero craft. we were excited together but feel talking to others would make us sound crazy or incredible. i know it was encounter of the 1st kind and i am confident to have a second whiteness to my personal testing. after later years telling my grandfather, he also had told me of a ufo sighting in a different lactation in oakland california during the 1950's of different weather ballon looking craft sighting of a drastic change if flight instantly speeding into space after a slow movement over the city so i feel more confident in my personal testimony.
content.summary: Remote camping site, witness confirmed with friend. too silent, close, and consistently bright orb to be confused by reflected sunset from normal aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: It was nearly late afternoon , clear sky ,early fall but still warm , i think it was,oct/nov.My friend and i was sitting out in  lawn recliners waiting on his sis to bring us iced teas , and it suddenly appeared over the desert hill ne like it came fromthe town mojave about 12 mls. from us it made no noise at all it was ginormous!  like a planet fell from the sky , by then all three of us were seeing it , and still no noise it hovered over us for a good five minutes then shot straight up and was gone in a count of three. my friends said afterwards that they've seen a cigar shaped one in the area yrs ago but not one like this.This was in the back yard you could say by the edwards airforce base and the dry lake bed , don't know if anyone else saw it then, but i would like to know. i dont know the county of lancaster, ca. so i just picked one sorry.
content.summary: Me and two others were in the back yard , it came over the back of a hill in antelope valley

content.detailedDescription: It was the end of another ordinary day and i went to my bed and fell asleep. i woke up and i was cold and noticed i wasn't on my soft bed anymore. i was on a cold table. the next thing i noticed is a very bright light above me on a silver background. and right after that i noticed 3 gray alien like beings one to my left and right. and another at my feet. i freaked out and immediately tried to move back but realized i could not move. i struggled really hard and was able to slightly move maybe an inch and then things got hazy and i don't remember much after that except waking up again still slightly immobile but i was able to move and speak again and i turned on all my lights and did not sleep for the rest of the night.
content.summary: Woke up on a hard table and slightly immobile surrounded by 3 gray like beings.

content.detailedDescription: When i was appropriately six years old i was outside playing with my friend by our barn. i don't know why i looked up and across our pasture, but i did. this cigar shaped object came slowly our direction. it could not have been 5 ft off the ground. it traveled through our pasture coming right towards us, down our driveway and right past us by the barn. it kept going in a straight line through our other pasture until i lost site of it. the amazing thing is that i touched it as it went by us. i remember banging on it with my hand. it was barely moving and just seemed to float as it went by. it was white in color and it has red at the tail end. i remember thinking that it looked like a rocket or a missile. i still can see it in my memory clearly to this day. i have no idea what it was. i have told my family about it and they seem to agree it was some sort of ufo. it would be interesting to me if there have been other similar/same visuals of this. i remember  just a feeling of interest, and not much more. cause i went back to goofing off with my friend to the best of my knowledge.
content.summary: A floating rocket shaped object, came by me when i was young. as it went by i touched it and it just kept going in a straight line out of site.

content.detailedDescription: Driving from fort ord california. on leave. going south just north of vandnberd afb. 3 am, clear night. a light with no tail was rising what appeared to be over the base. i thought it was a barium rocket, but was wrong time of day  for that test.  i stopped the car and watched this light rise and stop at about 5,000 feet altitude. this ball or light started to glow brighter and as it did the object appeared to grow in size. this light would get bright and large and small and dim. this went on for 30 seconds or so. then it got very bright and large and shot off on a 45 deg angle and was done in a few seconds. no sigh of engine exhaust, as in a rocket or jet. my feeling were, this is not normal. what do we have that can hover,  pulsate with light and shoot off in a matter of seconds ? is the air force hiding or testing something?  i had not been drinking, stoned or emotionally tripping when i saw this.
content.summary: Object was about 5,000 ft alt. object stopped, hovered and began to glow brightly and appear to become larger.

content.detailedDescription:
I was almost 13.  it was around june 10 or 11, 1967. my family was moving to germany in a few days so everything was packed up including the curtains on the windows. we were living on the edge of base housing near an air force base in the sacramento, california area.  behind our house was a chain link fence.  on the other side of the fence there was a vast amount of scrub acreage.  there were very few trees. i had explored this area and found no buildings or roads of any kind.  this area was not near the base.  the base could not be seen from this area.

i had a bedroom to myself.  i was asleep and was woke up by a very bright pulsating white light shining in the window.  i looked at my alarm clock because i thought it was time to get up but it was exactly 2:00 am.  i got up, crouched down and looked out the window.  i was terrified by what i saw but felt compelled to watch.

what i saw was very close, and very large.  it was a disk shaped saucer with a dome on top. the craft was dull white or light gray in color. there was no noise at all.  the pulsating light was coming from the dome and from lights around the edge of the saucer.  the saucer was rotating. 
 
what made this unlike anything i have heard of was that it was hovering in a vertical position and from my vantage point i was looking at the edge and not the face of the craft.  very, very slowly it began to assume an horizontal position.  it was at this time that i left my bedroom and got my younger brother (he was 11).  when we returned to my window (1-2 minutes) the craft was completely horizontal and very quickly began a zigzag upward movement.  first it quickly moved right at about a 45 degree angle and hovered for a second, then it quickly moved left at about a 45 degree angle and hovered for another second.  last it quickly moved slightly to the right at about an 80 degree angle and disappeared into space (there were no clouds).  the craft did not have to accelerate but instantly seemed to reach maximum speed. 
my brother who witnessed this event is an aeronautical engineer and an airline pilot for a major airline.  he was also an f-16 pilot.  to this day he tells me that there is nothing man made that can move the way this craft did.
content.summary: June 1967 sighting near sacramento california

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling home from a work related site visit and relishing in deep thought.  at the moment, i had been thinking are ufos and et's real.  as i continued to think on this, my attention was drawn to the east bound side of the highway. i noticed something that looked like a cloud.  i thought a cloud? what?  why would a cloud be that low?  clouds don't hover that low.  then realized it was a cloudless beautiful day.  there were no other clouds anywhere near me except miles and miles in the upper atmosphere.  next i realized the cloud was actually moving.  silently floating above the power lines about twenty to thirty feet.  it was shaped like a potato.  as we passed each other,i thought that is the strangest thing i had ever seen.  is this real?  i slowed my car to stop and ask other drivers if they saw it too.  no one appeared to be stopping.  they kept going as though they saw nothing.  i began to wonder if that was for me since i had asked the question.  no one was in the car but me.  i continued to watch through the rear view mirror.  it continued to follow the highway like cars traveling on the road and it continued to follow the highway as far as i could tell when it reached a bend in the road.  i was so excited.  i saw my first ufo.  i told several family members and my immediate family.  no one was really interested except my oldest child who has seen his own ufos.  some i told i believe were actually a little scared.  i still think about to this day, but never saw anything again.
content.summary: The cloud like ufo floated above the power lines following the highway as a car would

content.detailedDescription:
Recalling this event makes my heart race  and fills me with fear to this day, decades later. i was about ten years old living in milford, ct, at 121 wepawaug drive. i was a couple houses down playing with a neighbor janice simon - who was the same age as me. we were right across the street from the liekowsi's. their son pauly was my age. we grew up together for the first ten years of our lives. a close knit block. we all knew eachother.
one afternoon while playing in the garage of the simon's we suddenly heard screaming. we ran out to the driveway and tried to see what  was wrong. 
suddenly, coming right at janice and i, was a huge ball of fire. we were so scared we grabbed each others hands and ran into the garage. i don't know how she thought to, but janice hit a switch near the door entrance that brought the garage door down. 
nothing happened. it didn't hit the door. after a few minutes we heard more screaming and went back outside. 
people were running all over the place! we heard sirens and there were fire trucks screeching down the other end of wepawaug drive. 
i ran home and my mother was outside in the backyard watching as our neighbors - the wheaton's kitchen was on fire. there was a huge hole where the fireball had entered and started the fire. 
the fireball then turned a straight angle and continued down the street. it actually rose as high as the second floor of another lady's house. i can't remember her name...But she lived directly behind the liekowski's. 
the fireball tore into one side of her second (2nd) floor and exited out the other side leaving a huge burned  circle on both sides. 
she saw it come in her house and died right there on the spot!! it was horrible! so many police personnel.
after it hit her house is when it changed direction completely and came at janice and i. 
i have tried for years to find any info on this or even witnesses. with no success whatsoever. i feel like i'm in the twilight zone because i haven't been able to find 
any proof this even took place. i still remember also when the wheatons kitchen was redone after the fire. 
to this day i try to find out what a fireball is. and the only reason i call it that is because thats what we were told it was. 
but if a fireball is supposed to be a form of lightning, how was it able to change directions more then once - and it was a beautiful sunny day. no storms or rain. 
i hope you don't think i'm nuts because i can't find any proof or witnesses.
content.summary: A fireball attacked our neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: I have had 3 events in my life in 2001 in barnwell south carolina i was asleep when i woke up and saw lights out of my window i couldn't move i tried to scream and couldn't for what seemed like 5 minutes then the lights were gone then i could move again.  then maybe a year later i notice a small hard metal feeling ball in my leg that wasn't there before i didn't think anything of it til maybe 5 or 6 years later when i was watching a show about aliens where a girl saw an alien and later found a small ball in her arm and they couldn't find out what it was maybe a tracker they thought, well in 2009 i had another event happen like in 2001 when lights came and i was awoken to find i'm frozen again but this time i'm living in oklahoma that's when i start to think the thing in my leg maybe a tracker too well i move to the next town over in 2010 and in 2011 i am on my back porch and look to the east and see a reddish oval ball moving out of the tree line and it is moving so slow i watch for like 15 sec and holler for my wife to come and see and she sees it as well and after she came out it lasted maybe 20-30 seconds then it just disappears that's when i start thinking even more about that object in my leg maybe it maybe a tracker well just like 3 days ago i tell my kids about it after watching your show and they feel it and i was like you guys think i should get it out my son was like check yea and daughters where like please no the aliens will get mad well i get a razor blade and start to cut it out and as i am it wasn't there it had moved like a half an inch over so i stopped well now that it i healing it has moved back to right beside where i had cut my leg open.  i just watched your show and decided maybe you guys can give me some answers, i will be more than happy to take a lie detector to prove my story.  i just want some help maybe you guys could get thing out of my leg and find out what it is so i'm not spending my whole life wondering if they are following me and i'm native american i am part choctaw i heard on your show they like to contact native americans.  please help me get answers.
content.summary: Red ball moving very slow then disappeared not the first time to witness an event 3 rd time

content.detailedDescription: I was in the middle of the dessert training in 29 palms marine base with 1st marine division 5th marine regiment. my platoon had just set up many 30 foot omnidirectional antennas on our site. our platoon noticed a large bright disc with multicolored lights hovering maybe 50 foot obove our antennas. it hovered over our location and we all had our weapons drawn. then the disc shaped object ascended in the sky. we called the sightings into 29 palms base headquarters and they responded it was just a weather balloon. our whole platoon saw it about 38 people and we all agreed what we saw and how could it be a weather balloon. after that night none of us spoke of it again. i am interested in anyone else that may have reported a sighting over 29 palms open desert around summer 2001 or time near or around that time within or around that time frame. thank you. we all got a strange feeling whole seeing the lights. we all were trained in calling in close air support and this was no plane made no noise hovered then ascended backwards into the sky disappearing.
content.summary: Disc shaped object with multicolored lights hovered and ascended backward over our sight of operation

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking outside in the back in the morning i was going to like me a cigarette happen to look to my left and seen these two bright objects descending from the sky it came close to some power lines and houses across from me it seems that they were observing me as i was watching it i didn't know what to think and set up felt like so excitement and full of energy i asked my fiance to hurry and bring me my phone to video but it seemed like she forgot some of them there would not be do anything but a memory of something beautiful so that think not really sure what they want from me but i know i've been studying them and looking for a long time i took the camera one night and it has / in it so i took a picture and it flashed back at me something to you i believe that's when it all startedi have other videos in sightings in arizona besides just the one i'm talking about which i never got but the ones i have i just as good or betterps willing to show what i have believe me i have evidence
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The two objects that i seen had a orangish yellow glow with a red glowing dome on top

content.detailedDescription: Brant lake,ny about 2am saw 3 individuals yet felt like there was more around -knew doors were locked yet saw one alien past through glass sidedoor -  about 5 foot human/like stringy arms/legs, dark oval eyes with 3 inch needle like-teeth... one nealt down next to me as mean my son resting on floor of a cabin , seem to back up when i thought "he/ she had big teeth", an then tilted head as i thought "you heard me"yet didn't seem to react when i spoke.. felt like it/he or she didn't mean me any harm, did seem curious at the cross i was wearing around my neck an touch my hand..Yet alarmed by disaster movie i had on tv..Felt i had to sleep then it was morning
content.summary: Did not see a craft - saw 3 individuals

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from work i observe the light to the left of me in the sky i pulled over to see what it was and noticed that it was a green shining orb i took video of this with my phone but that only lasted about one minute 50 seconds because my phone ran out of memory space at that point after the phone died i continued to observe the orb flying around and changing colors in all directions or was really cool experience.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo observed with video

content.detailedDescription: Around 1972-3 two other boys and i went to the south end of perrin afb not on base. there was a hill we and other friends would go to drink beer and watch planes land. my father was a fighter pilot who was a commander of a fighter squadron at perrin 1963 to 1965 about. he retired 1969 to denison. one of the other boys father was air force also. we just drove to top of the hill trees to the south open to north with clear view of runway north. bright light comes n over trees we start hollering and waveing acting stupid. the light stopped about directly overhead. the light was so bright we i could not see outline of anything. we realized that there was no sound and no wind and we got scared. i got in car with friend other guy got in his and we hauled ass down the hill on to the blacktop and headed west with our lights off. i looked back and could see the light start to head n over base at slow speed but looked like light went out before it went over base. it was about 10 years after that night i remembered and brought it up to my friend i was with. the other person i didn't ever talk with. i bring the story to you before it gets never told. i ask my father if he ever saw ufo while flying he said he had when we lived in wa state. another story.
content.summary: Bright light at south end of perrin afb going n. stops overhead then goes n. over base.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were young and decided to go to sherman island boat launch late evening. as we sat in our car we noticed a bright super clean light  searching from side to side on the road coming towards were we were parked. in the 70's lights were not that clean and bright.  i thought it might be a helicopter. but it was very close to the ground. it made no noise at all. was not able to make out it's shape just could see the light. it spooked us so we ducked down in our car then the light shined on our car for several seconds and seemed like the object stop while it looked at our car. then the light moved off us and shined on another car in the parking lot. i don't believe anyone was in that car probably out fishing. but the light stayed on that car for a few minutes. then the object started moving again. it went over us and we got out to watch it. ok what we had seen so far in our minds was still exsplainable but strange. then it happened! it shotup in the air like a blink of the eye. so fast it left a tail like a comet for a micro second. we new nothing was that fast.  we told a friend and was laughed at never spoke of it again but a couple of times to each other. but it happened and it was real. we are not alone!
don't remember the month or day. it was to long ago. but could not submit with out a date sorry.
content.summary: Search light back and forth moved slowly over us then shot up like a reverse shooting star.

content.detailedDescription:
This craft obviously had terrain following capabilities.
it was silent with no discernable propulsion.
lights glowed, as if enclosed within nonglare frosted glass.
content.summary: Three of us, myself, two sisters waiting on older sisters boyfriend. craft came over hill, defended down through vally was observed miles away end of vally by friend. i seen this exact  craft  on tv! this happened about 1970. i retired 40 years in aviatio
